title: CyaY and TusA regulate ISC- and SUF-mediated L-cysteine desulfurase activity
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00225C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Paolo Olivieri, Jason C. Crack, Angelika Lehmann, Nick E. Le Brun, Silke Leimkühler
CyaY, the frataxin homolog of Escherichia coli, is known to regulate ISC iron–sulfur cluster assembly through binding to IscS. It also interacts with the SUF system, through binding to, and attenuating activity of, SufS.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
